channel.title: Hooklines & Singers
channel.description: The Reign is now over ,and now we're rockin with HOOKLINES & SINGERS a new Online Rock Show We bring you the biggest Hooks and The Rock Stars that sing them. Live interviews with interactive chat and call ins..Come listen as we move into YOU on the WWW.YOURADIONETWORK.COM Kickin off at 8 pm eastern!! BE THERE!.
channel.itunes:subtitle: With Jamie Allen & Kimmi Jae
channel.itunes:author: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
channel.itunes:summary: The Reign is now over ,and now we're rockin with HOOKLINES & SINGERS a new Online Rock Show We bring you the biggest Hooks and The Rock Stars that sing them. Live interviews with interactive chat and call ins..Come listen as we move into YOU on the WWW.YOURADIONETWORK.COM Kickin off at 8 pm eastern!! BE THERE!.

item.title: ANGELINE melodic rockers from Stockholm join H&S for some old school rock!
item.description: Jocke and Tobbe from the Band Angeline drop by the H&S studio for some lets get down to business rock! This Band.... Ladies... its what we love to Dance to.. the get up on the bar like we did back in the day and make all the guys stop and stare... The Ballads... guys.. if you want your woman to feel the night.. bring this CD home... What a couple GREAT guys.. GREAT BAND... FANTASTIC HOOKS! and isnt that what its all about! Listen in... and get back to Rock.
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ

The Ballads... guys.. if you want your woman to feel the night.. bring this CD home... What a couple GREAT guys.. GREAT BAND... FANTASTIC HOOKS! and isnt that what its all about! Listen in... and get back to Rock.

item.title: Erol Sora joins us for some Desire and Truth only on Hooklines and Singers
item.description: All the way from Vancouver Canada eh, Erol Sora joins us for a night of some serious Melodic rockin... we had a blast talking to this humble rocker , everything from his choice of guitars down to the boxer briefs he sports... and EVERYTHING in between! Enjoy the tunes, enjoy the conversation of the Melodic Rocker Erol Sora & the H&S crew!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
item.itunes:summary: All the way from Vancouver Canada eh, Erol Sora joins us for a night of some serious Melodic rockin... we had a blast talking to this humble rocker , everything from his choice of guitars down to the boxer briefs he sports... and EVERYTHING in between! Enjoy the tunes, enjoy the conversation of the Melodic Rocker Erol Sora & the H&S crew!

item.title: Chandler from OUTLOUD joins Jamie Allen for Hooklines& Singers
item.description: What a fantastic boys night out as KimmiJae was MIA for this show While the cats away ...The Boys will Play... JAMIE From Hooklines & Chandler from the Rockin Band OUTLOUD have man cave time and talk guitars and bars !! Check this out!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
item.itunes:summary: What a fantastic boys night out as KimmiJae was MIA for this show While the cats away ...The Boys will Play... JAMIE From Hooklines & Chandler from the Rockin Band OUTLOUD have man cave time and talk guitars and bars !! Check this out!

item.title: Jaded Past's George Becker Joins us on Hooklines and Singers
item.description: Our new friend George Becker has opened for hundreds of national acts including ACE FREHELY, CHEAP TRICK and CINDERELLA.on the music scene in the N.J. and NYC area. 2012 brings the release of his new band, and self titled debut CD, JADED PAST. Co-Produced by Becker and TRIXTER member Steve Brown who also played on the record along with Dennis Zimmer ( DRUMMER of Lita Ford band. Self Titled Full Length CD, Release Date was April 5, 2012 , get your copy now at www.jadedpast.com
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
item.itunes:summary: Our new friend George Becker has opened for hundreds of national acts including ACE FREHELY, CHEAP TRICK and CINDERELLA.on the music scene in the N.J. and NYC area. 2012 brings the release of his new band, and self titled debut CD, JADED PAST. Co-Produced by Becker and TRIXTER member Steve Brown who also played on the record along with Dennis Zimmer ( DRUMMER of Lita Ford band. Self Titled Full Length CD, Release Date was April 5, 2012 , get your copy now at www.jadedpast.com

item.title: TRIXTERS BASSIST PJ FARLEY ROCKS THE ROOF OFF HOOKLINES & SINGERS
item.description: PJ Farley, Bassist of one of best hair bands ever drops by the H&S ! TRIXTER is BACK and ROCKIN it old school! NEW AUDIO MACHINE is one FANTASTIC CD... and its available NOW! Trixter hit at the end of the Melodic hair band era.... leaving their fans wanting.. needing more.. After a 12 year hiatus its great to have this band ( one of my personal favs) back and sounding just as good if not better then before! The only thing changed is they have shorter hair lol... A guest like PJ is why we do radio!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ

A guest like PJ is why we do radio!

item.title: Michael T. Ross High Jacks Hooklines and Singers Radio!
item.description: No words can describe the interviews done with Michael T. others then INSANE... totally unscripted or uncontrolled its always an adventure to book him for an interview.. This trip out he talks about the madness surrounding his Music Career Mayhem as of late..and looking forward to whats to come of the Great Keyboardist formerly of The Lita Ford Band and Hardline. Still with Missing Persons and working on various other projects including his own.. listen in now and know.. with Michael, the music NEVER STOPS!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ

Still with Missing Persons and working on various other projects including his own.. listen in now and know.. with Michael, the music NEVER STOPS!

item.title: Grand Design on Hooklines and Singers! Bringing the 80's vibe back!
item.description: What a fun interview! Grand Design is one of those bands that just BRINGS IT! Rockin Riffs, Heart Stopping Drums and Hooks that get in your head, One of those bands that have the girls dancing on the tables! Come party with us as we speak with Grand Design!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
item.itunes:summary: What a fun interview! Grand Design is one of those bands that just BRINGS IT! Rockin Riffs, Heart Stopping Drums and Hooks that get in your head, One of those bands that have the girls dancing on the tables! Come party with us as we speak with Grand Design!

item.title: Aaron Ellis joins H&S for his first interview in over 2 years! The New CD is in the works!
item.description: Aaron Ellis has come along way in his Journey to regain what was lost a few years ago.... Music being his driving force , hes back and this time wiser, still with his strong following of loyal fans now even stronger and focused. Candid talk with Hooklines and Singers, he speaks to his fans from the heart and promises that this coming summer you will have that long awaited album that once thought was out of his reach forever!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ

Candid talk with Hooklines and Singers, he speaks to his fans from the heart and promises that this coming summer you will have that long awaited album that once thought was out of his reach forever!

item.title: Dust and Bones drops by Hooklines and Singers Radio
item.description: Nick Elmore front man for Dust and Bones comes by the H&S to tell us about the newest CD out now! Around since 2008 if you havent heard of these guys.. well then youre missin out... check out the interview and the NEW cd!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
item.itunes:summary: Nick Elmore front man for Dust and Bones comes by the H&S to tell us about the newest CD out now! Around since 2008 if you havent heard of these guys.. well then youre missin out... check out the interview and the NEW cd!

item.title: Robert Fleischman Takes H&S thru his Journey with the Band
item.description: Before Journey had Steve Perry they had Robert Fleischman as front man.. now Robert has his own Journey with his band The Sky... come listen in to the interview that takes you thru the years and hear the tunes from The Sky!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
item.itunes:summary: Before Journey had Steve Perry they had Robert Fleischman as front man.. now Robert has his own Journey with his band The Sky... come listen in to the interview that takes you thru the years and hear the tunes from The Sky!

item.title: ERIC ST. MICHAELS from CHINA Rocks HOOKLINES and SINGERS RADIO
item.description: ERIC ST.MICHAELS OF THE ROCK BAND CHINA JOINED US ON H&S ALL THE WAY FROM SWITZERLAND! The CD LIGHT UP THE DARK is one you are going to run out and get right now before the summer cruisin weather hits.. its a must have for any rocker. Eric takes us back to when the band started.. the 15 yr hiatus and now they are back and badass as ever! Just hit play and enjoy your trip to CHINA!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ

item.title: Promo Jeff and Terry did for us!
item.description: AOR singer /songwriter Jeff Paris and Great Whites Terry Ilous did us a commercial blip for our show!! GREAT couple a guys and a blast to talk with! \m/ Rock On Guys \m/ & THANK YOU from Hooklines & Singers!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ

item.title: PSA for United Rockers 4 U
item.description: PSA announcement for the the United Rockers 4U charity effort to support the world disaster relief in conjunction with the Red Cross.
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
item.itunes:summary: PSA announcement for the the United Rockers 4U charity effort to support the world disaster relief in conjunction with the Red Cross.

item.title: United Rockers 4 U , Jeff Paris and Terry Ilous guest on H&S
item.description: Rock legends AOR Jeff Paris and Terry ILous from XYZ and GREAT WHITE stop by H&S to tell us about their Effort to help the trauma victims from various natural disasters, Joplin MO to Tsunami in Japan !“One Family” by United Rockers 4U features an all-star lineup comprised of such artists as Eddie Money, Bobby Kimbal (Toto), Don Dokken (Dokken), Jimi Jamison (Survivor), Terry Ilous (Great White/XYZ), Robin McAuley (MSG/Survivor), Jeff Paris, Richie Kotzen (Poison/Mr. Big), Paul Shortino (Rough Cutt), Phil Lewis (LA Guns), Rudy Sarzo (Ozzy Osbourne/Quiet Riot/Whitesnake), Brian Tichy (Whitesnake/Foreigner/Billy Idol), Robert Sarzo (Hurricane), and Michael Thompson.
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ
item.itunes:summary: Rock legends AOR Jeff Paris and Terry ILous from XYZ and GREAT WHITE stop by H&S to tell us about their Effort to help the trauma victims from various natural disasters, Joplin MO to Tsunami in Japan !“One Family” by United Rockers 4U features an all-star lineup comprised of such artists as Eddie Money, Bobby Kimbal (Toto), Don Dokken (Dokken), Jimi Jamison (Survivor), Terry Ilous (Great White/XYZ), Robin McAuley (MSG/Survivor), Jeff Paris, Richie Kotzen (Poison/Mr. Big), Paul Shortino (Rough Cutt), Phil Lewis (LA Guns), Rudy Sarzo (Ozzy Osbourne/Quiet Riot/Whitesnake), Brian Tichy (Whitesnake/Foreigner/Billy Idol), Robert Sarzo (Hurricane), and Michael Thompson.

item.title: FARCRY's own PETE FRY guest on Hooklines and Singers Radio!
item.description: GOOD TIME HAD BY ALL.... seriously how could it have been anything else!! We had Pete Freakin Fry with us and we got down to the briefs with him :P With the Frycry Cd out now ( and if you havent heard it yet you are sooooo missin out) Pete tells us How FarCry came about, whats happening now and wheres it goin! With an added personal look at himself as just a Joisey Boy livin life as we know it. Come listen to the Rockin Riffs of Farcry!
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ

With an added personal look at himself as just a Joisey Boy livin life as we know it. Come listen to the Rockin Riffs of Farcry!

item.title: Pretty Boy Floyd's Kristy Krash Majors on Hooklines & Singers
item.description: Kristy Majors literally drops in last minute on H&S and tells us all about the Pretty Boy Floyd experience! Rock and Roll till death due us part describes this one on one with this hardcore band member.. Listen in but have your bleep button on lol... its one passionate interview! \m/ its all hard rock from here \m/

Listen in but have your bleep button on lol... its one passionate interview! \m/ its all hard rock from here \m/

item.title: <3 from Hooklines & Singers ! We got stood up for Valentines! But thats ok we rocked it out anyways!
item.description: What a night on H&S, our Guest apparently got snowed in and couldnt be on air with us.. but in TRUE ROCKER STYLE, Jamie and I Rocked our Roll and Brought you some Valentine Love Rockstar Style! Join us for this show where its Sex, Drinks & Rock and Roll... cause DRUGS are BAD Mkay! lol. BUT, be ready for next week Kids as we have PRETTY BOY FLOYD rockin our show!!! BUT for now check this hot mess out!

BUT for now check this hot mess out!

item.title: Rock Goddess ROBIN BROCK and HOOKLINES & SINGERS has her!
item.description: Sometimes the best Melodic Rockers arent Men.... but a ROCK GODDESS from CANADA!! ROBIN BROCK brought it to HOOKLINES and SINGERS!!! And in TRUE ROCKSTAR form she overcame the ever so sporatic Skype issues we had that night.. Because a True performer knows THE SHOW MUST GO ON! with Skype issues edited out.. Heres ROBIN BROCK! SHE ROCKS!!!

SHE ROCKS!!!

item.title: SUPAGROUP Rocks out on HOOKLINES AND SINGERS!
item.description: Chris Lee of the ultimate Badass Party Band SUPAGROUP drops by HOOKLINES AND SINGERS to prop their newest hit HAIL HAIL! This band rocks like no other and wait theres more, Google these guys and you'll find hysterical You tubes,mini movie skits... Good time had by all, check this out and enjoy the craziness of SUPAGROUP! WE DID!!!!

item.title: Mark Thompson-Smith Of BIG LIFE On Hooklines & Singers!
item.description: Mark Thompson Smith you remember him from Praying Mantis NOW he's BIG LIFE! GREAT band out of the UK! We had SUCH A BLAST with this legend rocker...Great Guy, Great Music and we are FAR from done... Listen to Hooklines & Singers LIVE every Tuesday Night at 8pm Central / 9 eastern on the Youradionetwork.com !

item.title: H&S welcomes Kenni DeNile to the show
item.description: Again... you cant say we didnt bring it.. Dreamer Kenni DeNile rocks the hour out with Jamie & Kimmi ... even sings a little for us in the end.. Check out the tunes and see how this Rocker got started.
item.dc:creator: Hooklines & Singers with Jamie Allen & KJ

item.title: Premiere Show with Johnny Lima !!
item.description: Johnny Lima is our Special Premiere Show Guest for the kickoff of the newest Rock Mag Show HOOKLINES AND SINGERS ! On the all NEW www.YOUradionetwork.com What a wild time we had with Johnny.. Awesome musician and amazing singer.. just goes to show.. Hooklines & Singers promises you only the best! Listen in and get your world ROCKED!
